Package com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType

Class CustomReport

java.lang.Object
com.ansi.scilla.common.ApplicationObject
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.AnsiReport
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.AbstractReport
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.CustomReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportBy, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataDumpReport, SixMonthRollingVolumeReport
public abstract class CustomReport
extends AbstractReport
A Custom report cannot use the standard builders (because it's custom, not standard). So each custom report must implement its own builders, either to create HTML, an XLS workbook, or to add itself to an existing workbook
Author:
dclewis
See Also:
